%% Circuit Breaker Pattern - Fault Tolerance %% Version: 1.0.0 %% Date: 2025-10-27 %% Description: Circuit breaker pattern for webhook delivery and external service calls stateDiagram-v2 [HealthTech_HIPAA_Vault] --> Closed: Initial State Closed --> Open: Failure Threshold Exceeded
(HealthTech_PatientRecords) Closed --> Closed: Successful Request
(HealthTech_HIPAA_Vault) Closed --> Closed: Failed Request
(HealthTech_EMR_Sync) Open --> HalfOpen: Timeout Elapsed
(HealthTech_PatientRecords) Open --> Open: Request Attempted
(HealthTech_DiagnosticEngine) HalfOpen --> Closed: Test Request Successful
(HealthTech_PatientRecords) HalfOpen --> Open: Test Request Failed
(HealthTech_PatientRecords) HalfOpen --> HalfOpen: Waiting for Test
(HealthTech_EMR_Sync) note right of Closed CLOSED STATE - All requests flow through - Monitor failure rate - Track response times - Increment error counter end note note right of Open OPEN STATE - Block all requests - Return cached response - Or return error immediately - Wait for timeout period - Log all blocked attempts end note note right of HalfOpen HALF-OPEN STATE - Allow test requests - Limited throughput - Monitor success rate - Quick transition decision end note
compilation_error: [WinError 2] 系统找不到指定的文件。
